Why training-cum-internship ?The food domain is booming rapidly. Companies are not only looking for degree holders but also individuals with great knowledge and skillsets. It becomes vital for students to stay updated to get ahead in the industry and build a competitive advantage for themselves. 
Duration:One month
Topics covered:Aspects of New Food Product Development Idea Generation Market Research Formulations & Evaluation Product Specifications Feasibility Study (Technical, Regulations & Financial)Process Development Internal TestingSampling and Market Testing
What you learn:What is NPD?How to design and develop a product Conducting market research HACCPProduct testing & evaluation Microbiological and Physicochemical properties in NPDBusiness aspects in NPDCosting & Finance in NPD
Eligibility:Any food or food science enthusiast with a basic knowledge of food can apply. 
After successful completion of the internship, the intern will be awarded a certificate.

title: New Product Development - Food training cum internship

description.text:
Digital Platforms and Systems InternProgram TeamRemote, three-month internship
Global School Leaders’ Intern Program:Global School Leaders’ Intern Program is intentionally designed to be a supportive, engaging, and relevant learning experience for our interns and to provide needed capacity and contributions for our teams. 
Key elements of the GSL Intern Program:Our teams choose or design projects that will be interesting learning experiences and appropriate for short-term work.Our program utilizes a cohort model so that small groups of interns can join and learn together.We provide professional learning experiences for our interns, separate from their regular work. These experiences include exposure to other teams or aspects of typical non-profit work in the education sector.Our experienced team members are available to interns for one-on-one conversations to learn more about career paths and particular areas of interest.

Digital Platforms and Systems Intern At Global School Leaders, we integrate academic research and best practices to create versatile, evidence-based training resources for school leadership. Our primary goal is to enhance student outcomes. To facilitate easy access and organization, we offer several online portals that host these valuable resources. Additionally, we have platforms designed specifically for collecting impact and outreach data. These portals are hosted on various platforms, including Google Sites, Wix, Zoho Creator, and Document 360.
The internship role involves managing and enhancing GSL’s online platforms, analyzing usage data, maintaining databases, and streamlining systems to improve accessibility for the team and partners.
Key Projects and WorkstreamsGSL Platform ManagementPerform regular maintenance and updates on GSL online platforms, including link verification, content updates, testing, and ensuring all resources are current and accessibleAnalyze existing analytics of the GSL online platform, document usage trends, and build easily accessible reports for the teamDevelop and implement strategies for platform enhancement based on analytics 
Database Management and CRM SystemsManage, clean, and organize school leader databases across various systems (monday.com CRM, Airtable, Google Sheets)Propose and implement solutions for better database integration and management
Systems and ProcessesWork closely with Senior Product Manager to design better systems and processes for the GSL team and partners to access the GSL platformsManage and document all GSL online tools and subscriptions in a centralized location, making it easy for the team to access GSL subscriptions
The intern will gain valuable experience in platform and database management, CRM systems, and learning how to effectively process and organize data. Collaborating with senior team members, the intern will enhance their understanding of how nonprofits leverage technology, gaining insights into the challenges and opportunities at this intersection. Overall, through this role, they will contribute to a meaningful organizational technology strategy while optimizing online resources for greater impact.
In addition, we are looking for candidates to have the following qualificationsRequired Qualifications We will use these in our screening process; if you do not meet each of these, you will be denied.Experience using reporting tools such as Google Analytics, Looker Studio, etc…Experience working with CRM systems and database management 2–4 years of experience in both nonprofit and technology sectors (school and informal experiences are applicable)Experience in testing online products for quality assurance to find any issues and to ensure everything works smoothly as expected.Resides in Africa or AsiaIntermediate ability to speak, read, and write in English (B2 or above)Ability to commit to part-time work from around January 2024 – March 2025 (exact beginning and end dates are flexible)Ability to devote 10–15 hours per week to GSL projects with some early morning or late evening calls (some weeks might be heavier or lighter)
Preferred Qualifications These will not be used for screening purposes; if you feel you have some but not all of these, you are still encouraged to apply.Academic background in technology, computer science, or related fieldExperience in utilizing a user-centric approach to technology (i.e., considering how technology can be optimized to best serve the users)Experience in proactively identifying opportunities to enhance user experience and platform efficiencyExperience in managing assigned projects independently, driving them forward with minimal supervisionCapability to find creative solutions within the constraints of available tools and resourcesExperience in managing projects with external stakeholders
Working remotelyYou will work around 10–15 hours each week, with some weeks requiring more time than others.You must have internet access and access to a computer. These will not be provided for you.You will have little supervision and will need to monitor your own tasks and time carefully. Your manager will check in with you at least once each week and will expect to see evidence of progress made on your projects during each check-in.Because there is little supervision, you will need to be proactive about reaching out for help, asking questions, and scheduling time to talk to others on the team as needed.Your working times can be flexible, but you will need to work with your manager to align your schedules. For example, you will not be able to work exclusively on weekends and you may need to have calls outside of typical working hours to account for the different time zones across our team.You will be paid hourly and are expected to keep track of your time and submit timesheets and invoices. Your manager will review your time to ensure it is in line with the tasks you have completed.

Work Location and RemunerationThe intern can be based in any country. The intern must have work authorization in their place of residence as GSL is not able to sponsor employment visas. A modest hourly rate is paid to all interns based on the cost of living and purchasing power in their country/city of residence. All interns will be paid at least the mandated minimum wage in their country or sometimes more in cases when the minimum wage is significantly lower than the living wage.

description.text:
Refonte Infini is an international leader in IT and EdTech services, recognized for providing innovative and practical solutions. Our expertise covers key areas such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), Digital Marketing, Data Science, Data Analytics, UI/UX Design, Web Development, and App Development. We aim to deliver excellence while empowering individuals and businesses to succeed in a fast-evolving digital world.

The demand for cybersecurity professionals is rapidly growing, and Refonte Infini offers an excellent opportunity to gain real-world experience through our Cybersecurity Training & Internship Program. This program is designed for individuals who want to not only learn cybersecurity but also apply their skills in a professional environment.
📚 Program Overview:
1-In-Depth Training:Practical Curriculum: Master the fundamentals and advanced concepts in network security, threat detection, vulnerability assessment, and incident response. This program provides actionable strategies to safeguard data and proactively address cybersecurity risks.Engaging Learning Experience: Participate in live, interactive workshops led by seasoned cybersecurity experts. You’ll engage in hands-on labs, real-time simulations, and discussions on actual security incidents faced by organizations.Accredited Certification: Upon completion, you will receive a recognized certification that demonstrates your proficiency in cybersecurity—an asset sought by leading employers in the industry.2-Real-World Internship:Work on Live Cybersecurity Projects: Apply your knowledge to actual security operations. You’ll handle pressing issues like protecting networks, preventing breaches, and responding to cyber incidents in real time.Expert Mentorship: Collaborate with cybersecurity professionals who bring years of field experience. Gain personalized guidance and mentorship to help you navigate complex security environments. Professional Skill Development: Strengthen your skills in a professional environment through continuous feedback, practical experience, and exposure to real-world cyber threats. This will empower you to effectively address emerging cybersecurity challenges.
Who Should Apply?Individuals who are passionate about cybersecurity and looking to develop hands-on skills.Recent graduates or professionals seeking to build a career in cybersecurity by gaining practical experience.Self-motivated learners with a desire to contribute to protecting digital infrastructures.
Benefits:Hands-On Experience with Real-World Applications: This isn’t just theoretical. You will work on live cybersecurity challenges, including threat analysis, network defense, and security incident management.Mentorship from Industry Experts: You’ll be guided by professionals who have extensive experience in cybersecurity, providing valuable feedback and industry insights.Industry-Recognized Certification: Gain a certification upon completing the program that will validate your skills and help open doors to career opportunities.Valuable Networking Opportunities: Engage with cybersecurity professionals and build connections that can help you advance your career.Career Growth Potential: As cybersecurity is one of the most in-demand fields, the skills and experience gained during this internship will make you highly competitive for future job opportunities.
🌟 Why Choose Us?While the position is unpaid, the practical knowledge, industry connections, and real-world experience you’ll gain are invaluable. This program provides the perfect bridge between theory and practice, setting you up for success in the competitive field of cybersecurity. Many of our interns have gone on to secure roles in IT security, risk management, and cyber defense at leading organizations.
If you’re ready to start a career in cybersecurity and want to gain real-world experience, apply today!


🚀 Advance Your Cybersecurity Career: Join Our Practical Training & Internship Program!🚀
#Cybersecurity #TrainingAndInternship #ITSecurity #CyberDefense #CareerOpportunity

Refonte (or Refonte AI) is a globally recognized leader in the IT industry, renowned for delivering high-quality IT and Ed-tech services. We specialize in Artificial Intelligence (AI), digital marketing, data science, data analytics, UI/UX design, web development, and app development. Our commitment to innovation, excellence, and talent empowerment extends across the globe.
Learn More On: https://refontelearning.com/
Job Summary:
Refonte is looking for motivated and forward-thinking individuals to join our global team, eager to advance their expertise in AI and Data Analytics. This role offers more than just flexibility—it provides the opportunity to work on international projects alongside a diverse team spanning Oceania, Asia, Europe, and the Americas. You will gain invaluable experience, learn cutting-edge technologies, and contribute to meaningful projects within a dynamic, globally recognized IT company.
Job Description:
We are excited to offer an internship opportunity focused on AI and Data Analytics. As an AI & Data Analytics Intern, you will engage with industry professionals to work on innovative projects that combine artificial intelligence, data science, and cloud technologies. You will gain hands-on experience in these interconnected fields, learning how to analyze vast datasets, develop machine learning models, and create impactful AI-driven solutions. This is an exceptional opportunity to develop your skills in data analytics, predictive modeling, and AI application deployment while contributing to projects that shape the future of industries.
Responsibilities:
Data Analysis & Modeling: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze and interpret large datasets, extracting actionable insights that drive decision-making.AI Model Development: Assist in developing and optimizing machine learning models to solve complex problems, enhancing performance through data-driven approaches.Data Pipeline Engineering: Contribute to the design and implementation of secure, scalable data pipelines for efficient data processing and storage.Cloud Integration: Support the deployment of AI and data solutions in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) with a focus on performance and security.Data Visualization: Create interactive and intuitive data visualizations that help stakeholders understand trends and make informed decisions.Continuous Improvement: Participate in refining and optimizing data workflows and AI models, ensuring high accuracy and scalability.Collaboration: Work closely with data engineers, AI specialists, and software developers to integrate analytics solutions across different platforms and projects.Research & Innovation: Explore emerging AI and data technologies to propose and implement innovative solutions that enhance business outcomes.
Projects You Will Work On:
Predictive Analytics: Develop AI models to predict trends, outcomes, and behaviors across various industries.AI-Driven Automation: Build automated solutions that leverage AI to streamline processes and improve efficiency.Data Integration & Management: Design and manage data architectures that handle large-scale, complex data environments in the cloud.Advanced Data Visualization: Create dynamic dashboards and reports that empower stakeholders with real-time insights.NLP & Text Analytics: Work on natural language processing projects to analyze text data, enhancing AI capabilities in language-based applications.AI Ethics & Compliance: Participate in developing AI solutions that adhere to ethical standards and comply with industry regulations.
Qualifications:
Currently pursuing a degree in Data Science, Computer Science, AI, or a related field, with a strong passion for advancing your knowledge in AI and data analytics.Solid foundation in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL, with experience in data manipulation and machine learning libraries.Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret and transform data into actionable insights.Excellent communication skills—both written and verbal—capable of articulating complex data concepts and collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams.Ability to work independently and as part of a team, demonstrating flexibility and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Learn More On: https://refontelearning.com/
Note:This position is part of our unpaid “AI & Data Analytics Training & Internship” program under RGTIP (Refonte Global Training and Internship Program). Upon application, our team will contact you to provide further details about the application process and next steps. This internship is designed to equip you with practical experience in cutting-edge technologies and prepare you for a successful career in AI and data analytics.

🚀🚀Join Refonte, where your passion for AI and Data Analytics meets global innovation—collaborate with industry experts on groundbreaking projects that shape the future of technology and business.

KaroStartup is a dynamic and innovative media company founded in 2020 by a team of more than five passionate entrepreneurs. We are dedicated to celebrating the success of startups by sharing their stories with the world. Our platform publishes insightful startup stories, writes engaging blogs, and produces captivating podcasts. With over 100 podcasts already in our portfolio, KaroStartup has established itself as a key player in the media landscape, focusing on entrepreneurship and innovation.
Position: Summer Internship ( Social media Marketng )
Location: Hybrid (Work from Home + Office)
Stipend: ₹5,000 - ₹10,000
Opportunity for Full-Time Employment: Yes
Internship Duration: 8-12 weeks
About the Role:
We are looking for enthusiastic and talented individuals to join our team for a summer internship. This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced startup environment where creativity and innovation are at the core of everything we do.
As an intern at Karo Startup, you will have the chance to work on a variety of projects and collaborate with different teams, including content writing, research, video editing, and graphic design. This role is ideal for students or recent graduates looking to build their portfolios and gain valuable experience in the media industry.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Content Writing:
- Research and write compelling startup stories and blog posts.- Assist in the creation of content for our podcasts, including show notes, transcripts, and promotional materials.- Collaborate with the editorial team to ensure content is accurate, engaging, and aligned with Curo Startup's brand voice.
2. Research Analysis
- Conduct in-depth research on various topics related to startups, entrepreneurship, and innovation.- Analyze data and trends to provide insights that will inform our content strategy.- Assist in identifying potential guests for our podcasts and interviews.
3. Video Editing:
- Edit video content for our podcasts, social media channels, and website.- Work closely with our creative team to produce high-quality videos that engage our audience.- Assist in the creation of video teasers and promotional clips for upcoming podcasts.
4. Graphic Design:
- Design eye-catching graphics for our blog posts, social media, and website.- Create visual content that complements our written and video content.- Collaborate with the marketing team to develop graphics for campaigns and promotions.
5. Podcast Production:
- Assist in the planning and production of our podcasts.- Work with different founders, entrepreneurs, and influencers to produce high-quality podcast episodes.- Manage podcast schedules, coordinate guest appearances, and ensure smooth production processes.
What We Are Looking For:
- Creative Thinkers: Individuals who can come up with innovative ideas and are not afraid to experiment.- Team Players: People who can work well with others and contribute to a positive work environment.- Detail-Oriented: Someone who pays attention to detail and ensures that all content is accurate and well-crafted.- Self-Starters: Individuals who can work independently and take initiative in their tasks.- Passionate Learners: Those who are eager to learn and grow in their roles.
Perks of the Internship:
- Hands-on experience in a growing startup with the potential for full-time employment.- Flexible working environment with a hybrid work model (work from home plus office).- Opportunity to work closely with experienced professionals and industry leaders.- Access to a network of entrepreneurs, founders, and influencers.- A supportive team that values creativity, collaboration, and innovation.
Application Process:To apply, please submit your resume, a cover letter, and samples of your work (writing, design, or video editing) to [email address]. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply early.
Join Curo Startup and be a part of a company that is shaping the future of media in the startup ecosystem!

Market Analyst Intern (Position ##1005_Intern)

Location: Jaipur, India

Position Summary

Futures First offers a unique opportunity in India to work in the worlds most stimulating, liquid, and well-developed derivatives markets. This is an exciting challenge and an excellent opportunity for bright, analytical, highly motivated graduates to join a vibrant business and participate directly in todays dynamic world markets.

At Futures First we are committed to provide our employees with the best in technology, training, and continuing education which includes training on financial markets and products, risk management, soft skills development, and one-on-one mentoring to develop the requisite psychological and endurance skills.

Job Profile

The job involves dealing in the most exotic financial derivatives & futures markets and would be trained to acquire a strong understanding of market structure for various asset classes. It would require the identification, research, and development of new strategies and ideas. It would involve analyzing and assimilation of market news/information/data to determine market sentiments, using technical and fundamental analysis in making decisions.

Requirements Education Qualifications

Strong Academics, Degree Educated or Equivalent.Preferable educational streams: Commerce, Finance, Economics, Mathematics, Statistics, and Engineering.

Work Experience

Not required.In case of experienced candidates, a good understanding and experience in futures markets and a proven track record is essential.

Skill Set

Numerate, great at mathQuick thinker, especially under high pressureCompetitiveSharp, with deep intelligenceHardworkingPassionate and driven to succeedPerform even better under pressure, and retain capacity for dispassionate learning in real-timeDemonstrated strength of character: integrity, initiative, judgment, commitment, emotional stability, persistence, resilience

Important Information

THIS RECRUITMENT DRIVE IS ONLY FOR CANDIDATES WHO ARE PASSING OUT IN JUNE 2025 OR BEFORE.DATE OF JOINING: January 2025Location: Jaipur, RajasthanCANDIDATES WHO HAVE TAKEN OUR RECRUITMENT PROCESS WITHIN THE LAST 1 YEAR ARE NOT ELIGIBLE TO APPLY.

description.text:
Content Developer Intern – Role Description

As a Content Developer Intern at IN-SEC, you will play a vital role in creating high-quality educational materials that empower individuals to tackle cybersecurity challenges. This internship presents a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in content creation, instructional design, and technical writing. Your contributions will be essential in producing precise, engaging, and technically accurate content that supports our diverse training programs, making a significant impact on our mission.
Key Responsibilities
1. Content Development: Research, create, and structure content tailored to a cybersecurity-focused audience. Design educational materials that effectively translate complex concepts into digestible and engaging lessons and guides.
2. Technical Writing: Develop precise and accessible documentation, guides, and instructional materials. This includes writing articles, how-to guides, and learning modules that clarify cybersecurity principles and best practices.
3. Instructional Design: Collaborate with the team to apply instructional design principles to create impactful learning experiences. Craft engaging layouts and interactive activities that enhance the retention and comprehension of critical cybersecurity topics.
4. Blog Management (1 Position): Oversee blog strategy, publishing schedules, and content curation. Edit submissions, manage topic relevance, and ensure content aligns with IN-SEC’s voice and educational objectives.
5. Content Creation (3 Positions): Focus on producing fresh, informative, and engaging content for our learning resources. Create Instagram/LinkedIn posts, articles, social media snippets, and other written materials that support our cybersecurity programs.
Skills and Experience
- Excellent writing and communication skills - Strong attention to detail and accuracy using Adobe, Canva is a plus - Experience in content development, preferably in educational or technical settings - Familiarity with cybersecurity concepts and a strong willingness to learn - Ability to convey complex information clearly and engagingly - Strong organisational skills, capable of managing multiple projects and meeting deadlines 

This internship is ideal for students or recent graduates seeking real-world experience in content development, instructional design, and technical writing. It is a two-month commitment, during which you will work remotely, collaborate with seasoned cybersecurity professionals, and make a meaningful impact by helping individuals develop crucial cybersecurity skills.
How to Apply
To apply, please email your CV and cover letter to srivardhancheriyala@in-sec.com.au by November 5, 2024. We look forward to seeing how you can contribute to our mission of enhancing cybersecurity education!
